oscar.name: yume
oscar.summary: Tools for rpm repository control, image creation and maintenance
oscar.description: Tool for setting up, exporting yum repositories and executing yum commands for only these repositories. Use it as high level RPM replacement which resolves dependencies automatically. This tool is very useful for clusters. It can: - prepare an rpm repository - export it through apache - execute yum commands applying only to this repository (locally) - execute yum commands on the cluster nodes applying only to this repository. This makes installing packages, creating cluster node images, updating revisions much simpler than with rpm.
